This article is a  List of awards and nominations received by Judd Apatow
Judd Apatow is an American film director, writer, and comedian. He has received numerous accolades including three Primetime Emmy Awards and a BAFTA Award as well as nominations for a Golden Globe Award, and a Grammy Award.
